name: Update Environment Documentation
description: Update README when environment variables or configuration changes

actions.prompt:
A configuration file has been modified that may affect environment setup or deployment. Please:
1. Review the changes in the configuration file
2. Check if any new environment variables were added or changed
3. Update the README.md file to reflect any new setup requirements
4. Ensure the .kiro/steering/tech.md file is updated with any new environment variables
5. Verify that deployment configuration is still accurate
